name: Len'en Tasouken ~ Earthen Miraculous Sword
description: Len'en Tasouken ~ Earthen Miraculous Sword (連縁蛇叢釼　～ Earthen Miraculous Sword) is a vertical-scrolling danmaku shoot 'em up and the second game of the Len'en Project. It was made by Trick Nostalgie's sole member JynX and released for the Windows operating system. The trial version was released on 12 September, followed by the full version on 18 November 2013 as a free download. It was developed and released concurrently with the first game in the series, Evanescent Existence. The game was made with inspiration from the Touhou Project.
